GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
ASoC: cs35l41: Fix an out-of-bounds access in otp_packed_element_t

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit dbc35268e14d5d89c7a9db72009ad4dcd9ede646, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 6450ef55905688602175fae4ed1bfbfef6a14dde. For more details please see the references link.
